state: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, travel east. With that over with, head north. Then, make an effort to travel west. Then, venture south. And then, make an effort to move east. Then, move north. That done, make an attempt to go west. With that done, travel west. Once you manage that, try to head south. Then, try to take a trip west. Then, attempt to head west. With that over with, try to head north. Next, attempt to take a trip west. After that, make an effort to go west. Once you accomplish that, lift the coin from the floor of the shower. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Laundromat =- Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the laundromat. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Laundromat =-0/1
